entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:01 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 07:01 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
